JOGO BOM COMPRA BESTA... PLAYERS MUITO BONS, BOA COMUNICAÇÃO SEMPRE, DIFICUDADE RAZOÁVEL DEPEDENDO DO SEU NIVEL DE GAMEPLAY... CHEFES FODAS, FAZES DA HORA (TODAS SEM EXEÇÃO) ENFIM LEFT 4 DEAD É BOM DE MAIS.

This is the crappiest zombie game ever made, it features bare minimum content that is flat on the ground. You can only play with one of either 3 weapons, pistols, shotguns and sub-machine guns, if you are lucky you might get an AR. There simply isn't enough content to keep this game alive, it is extremely low on content. The maps are very retarded, fucking small and designed in a very linear way. All you do is go from point A to point B and that is it, you will either die on the way or also die on the way because there are many brain-dead cunts playing in your team who are uncommunicative, unresponsive and cannot even shot straight for once, so it is impossible to win this game. Also, the zombie hoards are very predictable in their movements and everything, it is totally not fun to play.

Úžasná kooperativní zombie vyvražďovačka. Pro retro zážitek, nesmíte vynechat.
Reinstall ve SCORE 332.

Именно с этой части L4D начался творческий путь брутального старичка- Билла Овербека. Его медийную персону теперь не редко можно встретить в других зомби-шутерах и хоррер-проектах, где он оставаясь в образе, продолжает превращать толпы врагов в тухлый фарш...

I've always wanted to visit Russia, but I never could. With pandemic being in place right now I can't visit Russia through any normal means, but this game helps me with this goal. This game makes it really feel like I'm right there in Russia. This is the best Russia simulator 10/10
